title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 180.6 - Free sport fishing days
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 180.6 - Free sport fishing days

State Regulations

The term free sport fishing days shall mean the last full
weekend (Saturday and Sunday) in the month of June, the weekend immediately
preceding Presidents Day in the month of February, the fourth Saturday in the
month of September, and the official United States public holiday known as

Veterans Day observed on November 11. On free sport fishing days, the sport
fishing license requirement of the Fish and Wildlife Law is suspended. All
other provisions of such law with respect to sport fishing shall remain in full
force and effect during free sport fishing days. Any and all other rules, regulations and permit requirements shall also remain in full force and
effect. Notes

180.6

New

York State Register June 21, 2017 /Volume XXXIX, Issue 25, eff. 6/21/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
